definitions.definition: A piping or whistling sound caused by difficult respiration .
An ordinary whisper exaggerated so as to produce the hoarse sound known as the " stage whisper "; a forcible whisper with some admixture of tone.

examples: The new comedy is a wheeze .
You think you're going to win? That's a real wheeze !

definitions.definition: A sound that resembles a human wheezing.

main_definition: A piping or whistling sound caused by difficult respiration .
secondary_definitions: An ordinary whisper exaggerated so as to produce the hoarse sound known as the " stage whisper "; a forcible whisper with some admixture of tone.
( British , Ireland , informal ) An ulterior scheme or plan .
( slang ) Something very humorous or laughable .
A sound that resembles a human wheezing.
